sys_remote_update_set.name: Secured Service Tasks - Flow Name Update
Secured Service Tasks - Custom Service Field

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_cbcb64c4832102101d60c030ceaad3a8
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>true</action_query><action_update>false</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>task</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Secured Service Tasks</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/ ) {

    if (gs.getUser().hasRole('admin')) {
        return;
    }

    var userReference = gs.getUserID();

    var excludeServices = [];
    var securedServiceOfferings = new GlideRecord('cmdb_ci_service');
    securedServiceOfferings.addQuery('u_secured', true);
    securedServiceOfferings.query();
    while (securedServiceOfferings.next()) {
        if (!gs.getUser().isMemberOf(securedServiceOfferings.assignment_group.getDisplayValue()) &&
            userReference != securedServiceOfferings.assignment_group.manager &&
            !gs.getUser().isMemberOf(securedServiceOfferings.change_control.getDisplayValue()) &&
            userReference != securedServiceOfferings.change_control.manager &&
            !gs.getUser().isMemberOf(securedServiceOfferings.managed_by_group.getDisplayValue()) &&
            userReference != securedServiceOfferings.managed_by_group.manager &&
            !gs.getUser().isMemberOf(securedServiceOfferings.support_group.getDisplayValue()) &&
            userReference != securedServiceOfferings.support_group.manager) {
            excludeServices.push(securedServiceOfferings.getValue('sys_id'));
        }
    }

    if (excludeServices.length > 0) {
        current.addQuery('service_offering', 'NOT IN', excludeServices.toString()).addOrCondition('business_service', 'NOT IN', excludeServices.toString()).addOrCondition('service_offering', 'NULL').addOrCondition('watch_list', 'CONTAINS', userReference).addOrCondition('work_notes_list', 'CONTAINS', userReference).addOrCondition('additional_assignee_list', 'CONTAINS', userReference);
    }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-04-08 21:15:06</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>cbcb64c4832102101d60c030ceaad3a8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Secured Service Tasks</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_cbcb64c4832102101d60c030ceaad3a8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-04-08 21:40:38</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=cbcb64c4832102101d60c030ceaad3a8"/></record_update>
